sections.content: Gene-Curator is a versatile tool that significantly aids researchers in gene data analysis and curation, thanks to a strong and intuitive software design that prioritizes user engagement and data accuracy. Utilizing a web-based platform developed with Vue, JavaScript, and Firebase as a backend, Gene-Curator provides functionalities for uploading gene lists and performing gene-disease curation. It is fully customizable, displays important genetic information for curation, and allows manual and automated annotations with a JSON configuration file-based workflow. The platform emphasizes user-friendly and automated interfaces to improve curation efficiency and accuracy. Freely available code makes the tool easy to install standalone.

Kickstart your gene-disease curation journey with Gene-Curator.org. Start by exploring our database and familiarize yourself with the intuitive tools designed to make gene curation easy, fast, and reliable.

Our platform integrates ClinGen recommendations to streamline the curation process. From pre-curation to curation, and final storage in a curated entity repository, the currently implemented workflow is optimized for kidney disease diagnostic genes. It supports lumping and splitting of gene-disease entities, scoring systems for confidence levels, and tracks curation workflow versions and users for quality control and reproducibility.

Stay tuned for exciting future updates including a versioned curation workflow repository, integration with PanelApp, and enhanced data sharing capabilities. Our commitment to advancing gene data analysis and curation continues to grow.
Discover more about Gene-Curator.org, read our FAQs, or reach out to us for further information. We're here to support your research needs in gene disease association.
